i'm a bit tall and have long legs, i often struggle to find pants that are long enough, especially sweatpants. i sized up, as i usually do with pants, and these are perfect. they are big and loose and fit me very well, they aren't tight on my legs. i'm very happy with them. the inner material is very soft. i worried about static due to the material but i have had no issue with that. i recommend these if you're looking for good comfortable sweatpants at a reasonable price point.  edit: i've noticed slight static during drier weather, but not too bad. they also aren't very breathable, so they're good for keeping warm and for everyday wear, but maybe not for sports.
